plot outline: Former Vogue cover model Lee Miller travels to the front lines of World War II as a photojournalist and goes on a mission to expose the hidden truths of Nazi Germany. But in the aftermath of betrayal, she comes to a reckoning about the truths of her own past.
title: Lee - IMDb
plot: The story of photographer Elizabeth '_Lee_ (qv)' Miller, a fashion model who became an acclaimed war correspondent for Vogue magazine during World War II.

Former Vogue cover model _Lee_ (qv) Miller travels to the front lines of World War II as a photojournalist and goes on a mission to expose the hidden truths of Nazi Germany. But in the aftermath of betrayal, she comes to a reckoning about the truths of her own past.
